description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Michael Uno (miunosoft) Auto Amazon Links – Amazon Associates Affiliate Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Auto Amazon Links – Amazon Associates Affiliate Plugin: from n/a through 5.1.1.
